column4: ok ... so according to synaptic I have the latest Java installed ... but FF is obviously not seeing it that way
java.com says: Your Java version is Version 6 Update 20.  ... but in synaptic I have updated to 22
anyone with 10.10 using FF not able to access this page? : http://supportapj.dell.com/support/downloads/index.aspx?c=au&l=en&s=dhs
and can you see what this says: http://www.java.com/en/download/installed.jsp?detect=jre&try=1
for my it says that I am using version 6 update 20
that's odd ... 'cause you probably also have update 22 installed in synaptic ...
but still oddly you can still access that page ... whereas I cannot
btw ... did you open that dell link in FF?
ok ... because that link works fine for me in Chromium ... but not at all in FF
and this is testing on two machines both running fully updated 10.10
